- JavaScript (Node.js 20), HTML5, CSS3 + Express, pg (node-postgres), bcrypt, dotenv (config), express-session (or equivalent) (001-ecommerce-site)
- PostgreSQL (persistent products, users, carts, orders, sessions) (001-ecommerce-site)
